resources.string: We need this service to fetch balance from pop-up messages. It is absolutely safe to use.
"If accessibility service is turned off for this app, we can't fetch your bank balance. We read USSD message only to fetch your bank balance, that's it. So it is absolutely safe to use."
1. First, download and install the BHIM App.
2. Open the app and follow the initial instructions.
3. Verify your mobile number(standard SMS charges may apply). In case of dual SIM, select the SIM that is linked to your bank account.
4. Enter your name, valid email and set 4 Digit password.
5. Proceed to the next step and click on Create New VPA(This will be your upi address used for future transactions).
6. Select your bank and then your bank details will be fetched automatically.
8. Enter details of your debit card and click on verify.
9. You will get an OTP from your bank. Enter that OTP.
10. Enter a 6-digit UPI PIN and re-enter to confirm. Please note that this UPI Pin will be used in the future for your all transaction. So don\'t share this pin to anyone.
11. After successful registration click OK and open Digi-MORE app and click on UPDATE BALANCE.
If you haven\'t registered on UPI, follow these steps
We need to call from your phone to verify if your mobile number is registered on UPI.\nIn case of dual SIM, select the SIM that is linked to your bank account.
It seems your Mobile Number is not registered on UPI. Please call *99# from your mobile number which is registered with your bank and follow the steps.
Enter your UPI PIN in the next screen to complete the transaction
Your UPI Pin will be used in all future transaction. So don\'t share this pin to anyone and try changing your Pin at least once in a month.

1. Save our payment address as a beneficiary and name it 'Recharge' or whatever you like. 
2. Send recharge amount to the mentioned beneficiary by entering your UPI PIN. 
3. Within 10 minutes, give a missed call to us(we will not pick your phone unless you want to talk to no one). 

Follow these simple steps and we will do your recharge within no time. In case of failure, we will refund your money within 24 hours.
